data.name: Roombattle Demo
data.detailed_description:
In Roombattle destroy your friendships with your cute robot vacuum cleaner by popping their balloons with your sharp weapon. Be the last vacuum cleaner surviving and claim victory in crazy battles and a lot of minigames for up to 6 players in Free-for-All or in Co-op mode.

Roombattle is designed for all types of players and can be played with just 2 buttons and a stick. Don’t have a controller? No problem—you can also play using a keyboard!

Join your friends, customize your vacuum, and get ready to clash!

This demo includes:

  • Living Room Setting: Three different maps with plenty of interactive elements and obstacles with which to crash your vacuum cleaner. Beware of the cactus!

  • 6 Players vacuum battles

  • 2 Minigames: 

    • Roombout: Don’t let your vacuum cleaner fall into the water, or you will lose! 

    • Balloon Rain: Is it raining, meatballs? No, It’s raining balloons? We’ll have pop them all! 

  • 6 Power Ups: Crazy modifiers to make the matches more chaotic.

  • 2 Mistery Skills: The winner of the minigame will get a perk to make them (almost) invincible. 

  • Customize your vacuum cleaner: Enjoy up to 8000 different combinations to be the best vacuum divaner!

  • Remote Play Together Support

Battle your friends in diverse and colorful rooms fraught with dangers and obstacles ready to destroy. Every setting is different!

Drop a fish tank into the ground, crash into all the office supplies, or smash a 240-million-year-old dinosaur skeleton. Who’s gonna blame you?

Take advantage of the chaos (or at least try) to show who is the best vacuum cleaner!

Dance, score goals, have a nice time in the pool and even actually clean the room. Play a lot of crazy minigames in between rounds of battle mode or in minigame mode.

Up to 6 friends can clash in these minigames playing Free-for-All or in co-op. 


Want your vacuum cleaner to look like a pirate, a unicorn, or a kappa? How about a Viking with a magic wand?

Pick a color, a cute hat, an adorable pair of eyes, and a pointy object you’re gonna use to pop your enemies’ balloons.

data.short_description: Wreck, clean, and claim your victory! Roombattle is a 2-6 player family friendly party game where you control an adorable vacuum cleaner equipped with sharp objects and balloons. Customize your vacuum cleaner, fight your friends in chaotic battles and compete in tons of crazy minigames.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or similar
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
